items.sentence: I wish we could go back to the way things were before.
Tom told the police that he shot Mary in self-defense.
Tom tried to distract the police so Mary could escape.
Tom should\'ve pretended he didn\'t understand French.
I think we can make it to Boston in about three hours.
I thought Tom would ask Mary to go to Boston with him.
Needless to say, health is more important than wealth.
Now it\'s time for me to discuss a few rules with you.
I know Tom can\'t come to Boston, but I wish he would.
I wonder why Tom didn\'t want to go to Boston with us.
